body.p:
War Department,
Adjutant General's Office,
Washington, February 23d 1865.
His Excellency,
The Governor of Kentucky,
Frankfort. Kentucky,
Sir,
I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 15th inst. requesting that the 12" Kentucky Infantry may be consolidated with the 3rd Kentucky Cavalry.

In reply, I am directed to inform you that the proposed consolidation is not deemed advisable, the regiments being stationed in different armies: Other similar applications have been received by the Department, and refused for the reasons above stated.

I am, sir, Very Respectfully,
Your Obedient Servant.
Thomas M Vincent
Asst. Adjt. General

12
War. Department
Adjutant Generals office
Washington Feby. 23d 1865
Vincent Thos M.
A. A. G.
Refuses the request for the consolidation of the 12" Ky Infy. with 3d Ky Cavy. --
Recd A. G. O. Ky 2 Mar. 1865
